config.rightclickharvest.title: Right Click Harvest Config
config.rightclickharvest.requireHoe.tool: Only allow harvesting certain crops (e.g. wheat, carrots) if the player is holding a hoe in their hand.
config.rightclickharvest.showServerWarni: Whether to show the warning about playing on a server without RightClickHarvest installed.
config.rightclickharvest.harvestInRadius: Make hoes of different tiers harvest multiple blocks in a radius. Requires `requireHoe` to be set to true.
config.rightclickharvest.hungerLevel.too: The food usage when harvesting crops.
Whether XP should be taken or given for harvesting.
config.rightclickharvest.github: Report bugs and request new features on GitHub
text.rightclickharvest.use_a_hoe_warning: RightClickHarvest is configured to require a hoe - hold a hoe or set %s to %s in the config to disable this requirement. This message will only be shown once.
text.rightclickharvest.install_on_server: RightClickHarvest is not installed on the server. To function, the mod needs to be installed on the server, as well as optionally on the client. Set %s to %s in the config to disable this message.
